basic_information.scholarship_name: Dr. Carolyn Pool Scholarship in Museum Studies

description: This scholarship was established by Dr. Patricia Loughlin in memory and honor of Dr. Carolyn Pool, for her work as the Director of Museum Studies. It recognizes a History and Geography student who is active in Museum Studies. Eligibility Requirements Enrolled at UCO as full-time student History-Museum Studies major Minimum GPA 3.0 Continuing student for fall semester that the scholarship is awarded

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration

hard_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship

criteria.description: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"
criteria.raw_text: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"
